annotations.summary: Patient reports persistent anxiety and inability to relax for one month.
Symptoms include racing heart, sweaty palms, chest tightness, and sense of impending doom.
Panic attack at grocery store with palpitations, dyspnea, and dizziness.
Avoidance behavior, missed three days of work last week.
Severe insomnia with early morning awakening at 3-4 AM.
Mother diagnosed with cancer two months ago. Patient is caregiver while working full time.
Poor appetite with 8-pound weight loss in one month.
Increased alcohol and caffeine use to cope.
Previous depression treated with Lexapro five years ago.
